original_text: Of the oaks of Bashan have they made thine oars; the company of the Ashurites have made thy benches of ivory, brought out of the isles of Chittim.
korean_text: 바산의 상수리나무로 네 노를 만들었음이여 깃딤 섬 황양목에 상아로 꾸며 갑판을 만들었도다

sentences.original_text: Of the oaks of Bashan have they made thine oars
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 바산의 참나무로 너의 노를 만들었으며

sentences.original_text: the company of the Ashurites have made thy benches of ivory
sentences.korean_translation: 앗수르 사람들이 너의 좌석을 상아로 만들었으니

sentences.original_text: brought out from the isles of Chittim
